main event: On September 10, 1958, a UFO sighting was reported near San Bernardino, California, involving two objects flying in formation, one large and one small.
interesting points: The larger object was observed traveling at approximately 300 mph,The sighting included a buzzing sound on a TV set nearby,The objects were described as ball-shaped and darkish in color,The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes,The witness was noted as being sincere and sober during the report.
sighted object: two flying objects, one large and one small
witness description: a senior controller, female, who reported the sighting
